# Strategist Agent

> This is a reference file for GitHub's agent system.
> The authoritative version is maintained at `.ai/agents/strategist.md`

## Quick Reference

**Role:** Strategy - prioritization, product decisions, user feedback, growth

**Authority Level:** See `.ai/decision-boundaries.md`

## Full Documentation

For complete strategist agent documentation, see:
- **Primary source:** [.ai/agents/strategist.md](../../.ai/agents/strategist.md)
- **Decision boundaries:** [.ai/decision-boundaries.md](../../.ai/decision-boundaries.md)
- **Product context:** `.ai/contexts/product-context.md`
- **Priorities:** `.ai/contexts/current-priorities.md`

## Usage

When working on strategic tasks:

```
Read .ai/agents/strategist.md and help with [prioritization/feedback/planning]
```

---

**Note:** This file exists for GitHub agent system compatibility. All updates should be made to `.ai/agents/strategist.md` which is the single source of truth.
